member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentImageManager
member.summary: Contains the image functionality associated with a DocumentReader.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentImageManager.GetPageImage(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage)
member.summary: Gets a raster image rendering of a specific page in the document.
member.param: The requested page. Must be an existing page in the DocumentReader.Pages list and cannot be a a **null** reference.
member.returns: A Leadtools.RasterImage that represents the rendering of the requested page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentImageManager.GetThumbnail(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a thumbnail of a page in the document.
member.param: The requested page. Must be an existing page in the DocumentReader.Pages list and cannot be a a **null** reference.
The desired maximum width of the thumbnail image in pixels. Must be greater than or equal to 32.
The desired maximum height of the thumbnail image in pixels. Must be greater than or equal to 32.
member.returns: A new Leadtools.RasterImage that is the thumbnail image.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentImageManager.DocumentReaderInstance
member.summary: Gets the owner DocumentReader.
member.value: The DocumentReader that owns this DocumentImageManager.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentObjectManager
member.summary: Contains the object parsing functionality such as text associated with a DocumentReader.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentObjectManager.BeginParse(System.Object)
member.summary: Begins parsing this document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentObjectManager.EndParse
member.summary: Ends parsing this document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentObjectManager.ParsePageText(Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage)
member.summary: Parses the text of the given page in the document.
member.param: The requested page. Must be an existing page in the DocumentReader.Pages list and cannot be a a **null** reference.
member.returns: An DocumentPageText object contains the text items of the page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentObjectManager.DocumentReaderInstance
member.summary: Gets the owner DocumentReader.
member.value: The DocumentReader that owns this DocumentObjectManager.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText
member.summary: Contains the text characters and words found in a document page.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentPageText class.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText.BuildText
member.summary: Constructs the text of this document page.
member.returns: A System.String that represents the overall text of this document page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText.Characters
member.summary: Gets a list of the text characters found in this document page.
member.value: A IList of DocumentCharacter objects for each text character found in the page. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText.Fonts
member.summary: Gets a list of the fonts found in this document page.
member.value: A IList of DocumentFont objects for each font found in the page. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentPageText.Words
member.summary: Gets a list of the text words found in this document page
member.value: A IList of DocumentWord objects for each text word found in the page. Default value is **null**.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader
member.summary: Provides the main class for reading documents.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.Create(System.String,Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions)
member.summary: Creates a document reader from a file name.
member.param: The name of the document file. Must not be **null**.
Optional document loading options. If this parameter is **null**, then default options are used.
member.returns: An instance of DocumentReader ready to use.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.GetProperties
member.summary: Gets the properties (or metadata) of the current document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this DocumentReader.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases all resources used by this DocumentReader.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.Finalize
member.summary: This member overrides System.Object.Finalize.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.FileName
member.summary: Gets the name of the file associated with this DocumentReader.
member.value: A System.String that contains the name of the file associated with this DocumentReader. The default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.ImageManager
member.summary: Gets the object to use for obtaining a raster image render or a thumbnail of any page in the document.
member.value: A DocumentImageManager object that can be used to obtain a raster image render or a thumbnail of any page in the document. The default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type of the current document.
member.value: A System.String that specifies the MIME type of the current document. Default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.ObjectManager
member.summary: Gets the object to use for parsing the document pages objects such as text items.
member.value: A DocumentObjectManager object that can be used to parse the document pages objects such as the text items. The default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.Pages
member.summary: Gets the collection of pages in this document reader.
member.value: A collection of type DocumentReaderPage that contain an item for each page in the file associated with this DocumentReader object. Default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.RasterCodecsInstance
member.summary: Gets the Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs instance used by this document reader.
member.value: An instance of Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs that specifies the object used by this document reader to render and create thumbnails for the pages.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReader.ReaderType
member.summary: Gets the document reader type.
member.value: An DocumentReaderType enumeration member that specifies the type of this document reader.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions
member.summary: Provides options to use when reading a document.

member.name: M:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DocumentReaderLoadOptions with default parameters.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions.GetPasswordCallback
member.summary: Gets or sets the password callback to use when openning encrypted documents.
member.value: A DocumentReaderGetPasswordCallback object that specifies the password callback to use when opening encrypted documents. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions.Password
member.summary: Gets or sets the password used to open encrypted documents.
member.value: A System.String that specifies the password to use when opening encrypted documents. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions.RasterCodecsInstance
member.summary: Gets or sets the Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs object to use when rendering or creating thumbnails of the document pages.
member.value: A Leadtools.Codecs.RasterCodecs instance that indicates the object to use when rendering or creating thumbnails of the document pages. The default value is **null**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderLoadOptions.Resolution
member.summary: Gets or sets the resolution to use when loading document types that do not have a native resolution.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the resolution to use when loading document types that do not have a native resolution such as PDF or XPS. Must be a value greater than or equal to 0. The default value is 200.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage
member.summary: Contains information about a page in the document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.BitsPerPixel
member.summary: Gets the number of bits per pixel of this page.
member.value: A System.Int32 that represents the number of bits per pixel of this page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.DocumentReaderInstance
member.summary: Gets the owner DocumentReader
member.value: The DocumentReader that owns this DocumentReaderPage.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.DpiX
member.summary: Gets the horizontal resolution of this page in dots per inch.
member.value: A System.Double that specifies the horizontal resolution of this page in dots per inch.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.DpiY
member.summary: Gets the vertical resolution of this page in dots per inch.
member.value: A System.Double that specifies the vertical resolution of this page in dots per inch.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets the number of this page.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the number of this page.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.PixelHeight
member.summary: Gets the physical height this page in pixels.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the physical height of this page in pixels.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.PixelWidth
member.summary: Gets the physical width this page in pixels.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the physical width of this page in pixels.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPage.Size
member.summary: Gets the size of this page in logical units.
member.value: A Leadtools.Forms.LogicalSize that contains the size of this page in logical units (inches).

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPageCollection
member.summary: Represents a read-only collection of DocumentReaderPage objects.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderPageCollection.DocumentReaderInstance
member.summary: Gets the owner DocumentReader.
member.value: The DocumentReader that owns this DocumentReaderPageCollection.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderGetPasswordCallback(System.String)
member.summary: Prompts the user for a password if the document is encrypted.
member.param: The same file name passed to DocumentReader.Create.
member.returns: The password to use if this document is encrypted.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentFontStyle
member.summary: Indicates the styles of the fonts in a document.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentReaderType
member.summary: Indicates the document reader type.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter
member.summary: Contains the properties of a text character found in the document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of the character.
member.value: A Leadtools.Forms.LogicalRectangle structure that contain the bounding rectangle of the character in logical units. Default value is an empty Leadtools.Forms.LogicalRectangle with all values initialized to 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.Code
member.summary: Gets or sets the character code value of this DocumentCharacter item.
member.value: A System.Char that contain the UNICODE character code of this DocumentCharacter item. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.FontIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the font used by this character.
member.value: The 0-based index of the font used by this character. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the character in points.
member.value: The font size of the character in points. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.IsEndOfLine
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last character in a line.
member.value: **true** if this is the last character in a line; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.IsEndOfPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last character in a page.
member.value: **true** if this is the last character in a page; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.IsEndOfParagraph
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last character in a paragraph.
member.value: **true** if this is the last character in a paragraph; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.IsEndOfWord
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last character in a word.
member.value: **true** if this is the last character in a word; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentCharacter.RotationAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of this character.
member.value: The rotation angle of this character in degrees. Default value is 0.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentFont
member.summary: Contains the information for a document font.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentFont.FaceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the face name of this font.
member.value: A System.String that contain the face name of this font. Default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentFont.FontStyle
member.summary: Gets or sets the style of this font.
member.value: One or more DocumentFontStyle enumeration member values that specify the style of this font. The default value is DocumentFontStyle.Normal.

member.name: T:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord
member.summary: Contains the properties of a text word found in the document.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.Bounds
member.summary: Gets or sets the bounding rectangle of the word.
member.value: A Leadtools.Forms.LogicalRectangle structure that contains the bounding rectangle of the word in logical units. The default value is an empty Leadtools.Forms.LogicalRectangle with all values initialized to 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.FirstCharacterIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the first character that forms this word value in the DocumentPageText.Characters list.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the index of first character that forms this word value in the DocumentPageText.Characters list. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.FontIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the font used by this word.
member.value: The 0-based index of font used by this word. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.FontSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the font size of the word in points.
member.value: The font size of the word in points. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.IsEndOfLine
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last word in a line.
member.value: **true** if this is the last word in a line; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.IsEndOfPage
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last word in a page.
member.value: **true** if this is the last word in a page; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.IsEndOfParagraph
member.summary: Gets or sets a value that indicates if this the last word in a paragraph.
member.value: **true** if this is the last word in a paragraph; otherwise, it is **false**. The default value is **false**.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.LastCharacterIndex
member.summary: Gets or sets the index of the last character that forms this word value in the DocumentPageText.Characters list.
member.value: A System.Int32 that specifies the index of last character that forms this word value in the DocumentPageText.Characters list. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.RotationAngle
member.summary: Gets or sets the rotation angle of this word.
member.value: The rotation angle of this word in degrees. The default value is 0.

member.name: P:Leadtools.Forms.DocumentReaders.DocumentWord.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the word value.
member.value: A System.String that contains the word value. The default value is **null** (**Nothing** in VB).
